respondent.name: Ms.Jean Bouse
respondent.certification: By responding to this survey and signing below, I certify that I am a cigarette smoker 21 years of age or older.

questions.question: What is your regular brand of cigarettes?
Do you usually buy by the...
The next time you go to the store, your regular brand were not available, what would you do?
questions.answer: Go to another store buy my regular brand.

questions.question: Which of the following best describes you?
Which of the following statements best describes the way you use cigarette coupons?
questions.answer: Occasionally use coupons regardless of the brand

questions.question: Is there another smoker in your household 21 years of age or older?
How often do you use special in-store offers?
Would you be interested in receiving information about issues that affect smokers?
Would you be interested in joining a smokers group to help protect your right to smoke?
